author: Richard Hall, Richard Hall
title: Inside the hunt for a coronavirus test that could bring an end to lockdown
description: Richard Hall speaks to a scientist working on a test that the US government hopes could allow people to return to work
content:
Scientists have launched a major new study into people who have recovered from the coronavirus, which the White House hopes could lead to ending America's nationwide lockdown. 
The researchers begin tests this week to discover the effectiveness of using bloo… [+5530 chars]
